name: PendingChanged_ifPresentTest
description: Unit tests for the ifPresent method in the PendingChanged class.

test_cases.name: testIfPresent_ValueSetAndPresent
test_cases.description: Tests the ifPresent method when the value is set and present.

test_cases.name: testIfPresent_ValueNotSet
test_cases.description: Tests the ifPresent method when the value is not set.

test_cases.name: testIfPresent_ValueSetButNotPresent
test_cases.description: Tests the ifPresent method when the value is set but not present.
